name: Living in the Caves
description:
This is the first fully playable build (some people might call it 'pre-pre-alpha'), with minimal features. I had a lot of fun making it, but I'd be surprised if you could have a lot playing it!

Controls:

W to move forward, A and D to turn 90 degrees either way. Obviously you can only move forward through open tunnels and not cave walls.

The E, R and T keys are used to use your food, drink and fuel items to replenish your vital hunger, thirst and temperature bars.

You can gain more food, drink and fuel by finding and picking up mushrooms with the space bar.

If any of your vital bars reach 0 you die, then you find out how long you managed to survive for (as a matter of turns).

Good luck, thanks for playing, and look forward to it being less shit in the future!
